alert.note: Alert for Lane; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 10 at 8:20PM CST until January 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Scott and Lane Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight Thursday night to 9 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
